channel.title: Charting Alberta Covid
channel.description: Recent content on Charting Alberta Covid

item.title: Schools and Students
item.description: Covid-19 Cases in Youth Covid-19 Cases in Alberta Schools See Support our Students Alberta for the complete list of schools with Covid-19 cases. See Global News' Lauren Pullen reporting for more school VOC information.

item.title: Outbreaks
item.description: Current Numbers of Outbreaks by AHS Zone Calgary Zone 58 Edmonton Zone 38 South Zone 19 Central Zone 11 North Zone 28 Covid-19 outbreaks (not including schools, see below) current as of Tue, Apr 13, 2021. AHS data updated on Tuesdays and Fridays. Outbreak Charts Alberta Schools are not included on this map after January 18th, 2021 as the criteria for outbreaks in schools changed.

item.title: Variants of Concern
item.description: Current Covid-19 VOC Cases in Alberta Active VOC cases 8197 287 VOC Percentage 52.6% 0.22% Total VOC cases 12932 778 Total VOC recovered 4688 486 Total deaths from VOC 47 5 VOC specimens screened 31582 1212 Covid-19 variants of concern data current as of Tue, Apr 13, 2021
